> > Hi everyone,

> > to lower the amount of data Her=
itirx fetches I thought about using

pt-Headers.

e received

ved
> > document  (and saves gzip'd data into the ARC file)

ably about right.  We've not tried it on our end.  I'd be

t worked.  Would this be a useful feature to add?

 for the answer and for confirming my thoughts.

ed be a usefull feature to add as I'm more

o clue where it
